function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Email addresses provided may be used for phishing attacks, spreading malicious software, or unauthorized access.","Impact":"Potential compromise of personal and sensitive information, financial loss, or damage to reputation.","Mitigation":"Use secure email protocols, educate users about phishing risks, and implement multi-factor authentication for email accounts.","Technologies":"Encryption, email filtering, multi-factor authentication, security awareness training.","People":"Authors, researchers, and individuals whose email addresses are listed.","Owner":"Authors, institutions, and email service providers."}]}
